text: Mildred Jessie "Millie" Robinson (1924 - 1994) was a Manx road cyclist. Robinson was the holder of the world hour record in 1958. She was the winner of the first in 1955. She competed at the , in the women's road race event. Robinson was a . She was also a champion sheep shearer. == References == == Other websites == * Mildred Jessie Robinson - Biographies - iMuseum Category:1994 deaths Category:1924 births Category:British cyclists Category:World record holders Category:Manx people
title: Millie Robinson
